rules_text:
Tap up to two target creatures, then distribute two stun counters among them. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
Equinox {3}{U}{U} [i](If you cast this spell from your hand for its equinox cost, exile it. At your next upkeep, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
